title: Did Rahul Gandhi Say ‘A UP Woman Gives Birth to 52 Babies a Year’?
subtitle: Rahul Gandhi comments on UP Woman: A viral clipping that suggests that Rahul Gandhi meant that women in Uttar Pradesh can give birth to 52 babies a year is false.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral clipping suggesting that Congress President Rahul Gandhi has said that women in UP \”give birth to 52 babies a year” has been doing the rounds on social media.

The 10-second clip has him say, “यूपी में ऐसी महिलाएं हैं जो हर सप्ताह एक बच्चा पैदा कर सकती हैं, ऐसी महिलाएं हैं जो साल में 52 बच्चे दे रहीं हैं ।”

Various tweets and Facebook videos with this claim are present:
